item.title: No country for young men
item.description: Do you see the graph above? It’s how much Italy will have to pay to somebody (130% of its GDP) and how many young italians are not working. Our big problem I like to say that if you are a retired person, with a good month cheque, Italy will be a perfect country for you. Beatiful place, awesome foods, we have mountains, lakes, sea, hills. And the cost of living isn’t too high.
